alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 3:40PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Nassau and Duval Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 340 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Yulee to near Jacksonville International Arpt to near Bryceville. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Jacksonville International Arpt, Arlington, Neptune Beach, Cisco Gardens, Ortega, Craig Field, Little Talbot Island, Fort Caroline and Nas Jax. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval
